TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable beforefieldinit DependentPlatformMissingException extends System.Deployment.Application.DeploymentException

summary.span: 在 ClickOnce 部署的啟動過程中找不到平台相依性，而且部署不會執行時，所擲回的例外狀況。

span.span: The exception that is thrown when the platform dependency is not found during activation of the ClickOnce deployment and the deployment will not run.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在部署資訊清單中要求的平台和 ClickOnce 嘗試執行應用程式的平台相符時，會擲回這個例外狀況。This exception is thrown when there is a mismatch between the platform requested in the deployment manifest and the platform that ClickOnce is trying to run the application on. 在此內容中，作業系統已安裝版本的 common language runtime 或先前安裝的組件可以參考 「 平台 」。In this context, "platform" can refer to the operating system, the installed versions of the common language runtime, or a previously installed assembly. 例如，如果 ClickOnce 應用程式判斷提示，它需要 Windows XP 和，使用者嘗試執行應用程式在 Windows 2000 上會發生此例外狀況。For example, if the ClickOnce application asserts that it requires Windows XP and the user is trying to run the application on Windows 2000, this exception will occur.

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此建構函式會將新執行個體的 屬性初始化為系統提供的錯誤說明訊息，例如 "DefaultMessageDisplayedByParameterlessCtorWriterMustSupply"。This constructor initializes the property of the new instance to a system-supplied message that describes the error, such as "DefaultMessageDisplayedByParameterlessCtorWriterMustSupply". 此訊息會考量目前的系統文化特性。This message takes into account the current system culture. 下表顯示 執行個體的初始屬性值。The following table shows the initial property values for an instance of . |屬性Property|值Value| |--------------|-----------| ||`null`。`null`.| ||當地語系化的錯誤訊息字串。The localized error message string.|

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(string message) cil managed

param.name: message

span.span: The message that describes the exception.

param.span: 這個建構函式的呼叫端必須確保這個字串已經被當地語系化 (為了目前系統的文化特性)。

span.span: The caller of this constructor is required to ensure that this string has been localized for the current system culture.

summary.span: 使用指定的錯誤說明訊息，初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class with a specified message that describes the error.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下表顯示 執行個體的初始屬性值。The following table shows the initial property values for an instance of . |屬性Property|值Value| |--------------|-----------| ||`null`。`null`.| ||`message` 中指定的錯誤訊息字串。The error message string specified in `message`.|

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 進行還原序列化 (Deserialization) 期間會呼叫這個建構函式，以便重新構成經由資料流傳送的例外狀況物件。This constructor is called during deserialization to reconstitute the exception object transmitted over a stream.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(string message, class System.Exception innerException) cil managed
Public Sub New (message As String, innerException As Exception)

param.name: message

span.span: The message that describes the exception.

param.span: 這個建構函式的呼叫端必須確保這個字串已經被當地語系化 (為了目前系統的文化特性)。

span.span: The caller of this constructor is required to ensure that this string has been localized for the current system culture.

param.name: innerException
param.span: 做為目前例外狀況發生原因的例外狀況。

span.span: The exception that is the cause of the current exception.

param.span: 如果 innerException 參數不是 ，則目前的例外狀況會在處理內部例外的 區塊中引發。

span.span: If the innerException parameter is not , the current exception is raised in a block that handles the inner exception.

summary.span: 使用指定的錯誤訊息以及造成此例外狀況的內部例外狀況的參考，初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class with a specified error message and a reference to the inner exception that is the cause of this exception.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 被擲回以做為前一個例外狀況直接結果的例外狀況，應該在 屬性中包含對前一個例外狀況的參考。An exception that is thrown as a direct result of a previous exception should include a reference to the previous exception in the property. 屬性會傳回相同的值傳遞至建構函式，或`null`如果屬性沒有提供內部例外值給建構函式。The property returns the same value that is passed to the constructor, or `null` if the property does not supply the inner exception value to the constructor. 下表顯示 執行個體的初始屬性值。The following table shows the initial property values for an instance of . |屬性Property|值Value| |--------------|-----------| ||`null`。`null`.| ||`message` 中指定的錯誤訊息字串。The error message string specified in `message`.|

summary.span: 取得 URI，這個 URI 表示從哪裡尋求支援以解決所遇到的問題。

span.span: Gets a URI that indicates where support can be found for the problem encountered.
